map.legendDescription: Prevalence of night blindness in pregnant women

title: Prevalence of night blindness in pregnant women
subtitle: Prevalence of night blindness (a symptom of moderate-to-severe vitamin-A deficiency) in pregnant women,measured as the percentage of pregnant women with night blindness during the period 1995-2005. Note that all countries with a 2005 gross domestic product (GDP) â‰¥US$15,000 were assumed to be free from vitamin-A deficiency of a public health significance and were therefore excluded.
